title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline ? OCE
body: joined a ranked match then got black screened tried to restart client then got this message rip promos please fix this aids issue

replies.body:
Bump, I have having the same problem :(

First I could log in but pressing the Play button didn't work, so I tried restarting the client. Now I am having this problem.

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

This is happening to me right now. When I go to log in, my name is greyed out and I can't even click on the password section. I can't rejoin the game and my friend is in it right now. What's the bet I get a leaver buster too
Mine fixed itself and the screen just changed and I could enter my password and re join the game 25 minutes later though! But - we won, because my team hadn't given up or raged (too much) lol
dude that{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  the same with me it happening right now i think might have queues because of this
I never had any issues like this with the legacy client i wish i could use that i know id have no more client issues
